definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克，弄点儿咸肉就着煎面包片儿吃好不好？

sentences.english: Spoon scrambled eggs atop toasts. Sprinkle with more fleur de sel and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 将炒好的鸡蛋舀在面包片上，撒上盐和胡椒。

sentences.english: He spread some apple jam on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 她在烤面包片上涂了薄薄的一层山莓酱。

sentences.english: The bread looks like a coffin.
sentences.chinese: 面包片的形状看起来像棺材。

sentences.english: Finally add spanish ham on top of bread.
sentences.chinese: 将火腿片摆放在面包片上。

sentences.english: Thin bread and butter she likes in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早晨她喜欢吃涂了黄油的薄面包片。

sentences.english: Toast or rolls are also served and of course coffee is essential.
sentences.chinese: 也提供烤面包片或面包卷，当然，咖啡是必不可少的。

sentences.english: And would it be possible to have an English muffin instead of toast?
sentences.chinese: 并且能用英式松饼替换烤面包片吗？

sentences.english: He put the toast on the breakfast tray.
sentences.chinese: 他把烤面包片放到早餐讬盘里。

sentences.english: It's a machine for slicing bread.
Then I would imitate the acts of cutting the slices and buttering them.
sentences.chinese: 我会模仿切面包片，然后往上涂抹黄油的动作。

sentences.english: Then put it in oven and toast for 20 minutes or so.
sentences.chinese: 然后把它放在烤箱里，烤面包片20分钟左右。

sentences.english: Would you like some toast with your breakfast?
sentences.chinese: 你早餐要一些烤面包片吗？

sentences.english: She spread the toast thinly with raspberry jam.
sentences.chinese: 她在烤面包片上涂了薄薄的一层山莓酱。

sentences.english: Looking relaxed, the prince helped out fetching bread to make some toast.
sentences.chinese: 王子看起来很放松，他正打算做烤面包片。

sentences.english: We breakfasted on toast and coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我们用的早餐是烤面包片和咖啡。
